title: Intelsat orders another refueling mission from Northrop Grumman’s SpaceLogistics
summary: SpaceLogistics announced June 20 it has three confirmed orders for its refueling pods that will fly to orbit on a servicing mission in early 2025.

title: It appears that Roscosmos really is recruiting soldiers for the Ukraine War
summary: "State corporation Roscosmos calls on you to join the Uran volunteer battalion."

title: True Anomaly to pursue military contracts for virtual, live training tech
summary: True Anomaly announced plans to provide digital and live training ranges as a service.

title: Orbital Composites leans into space market
summary: Orbital Composites is gaining traction in the emerging in-space servicing, assembly and manufacturing sector thanks to government contracts and partnerships.

title: Ramon.Space reveals partnership with Foxconn subsidiary Ingrasys
summary: Ramon.Space announced a strategic partnership June 20 with Foxconn subsidiary Ingrasys aimed at high-volume production of satellite computing technology.
